alert.note: Alert for Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 7:02PM EDT until August 29 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 701 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Tiffin to near Vanlue, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Tiffin, Green Springs, Bloomville, New Riegel, Attica, Bettsville, Republic, Flat Rock, Bascom and Kansas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Strong winds will proceed the heavy rain with this thunderstorm.
